animeDescription: After many years of dormant rest, a hot springs fairy awakens in modern-day Japan. However, while she slept, she took on the appearance of a young girl. She decides to cooperate with the locals whilst trying to regain her powers.(Source: LiveChart)
animeVoices: ['Ono, Saki', 'Ichimichi, Mao', 'Murata, Taishi', 'Asai, Ayaka', 'Satou, Haruo', 'Morisawa, Fumi', 'Yuuki, Aoi', 'Kuwahara, Yuuki', 'Taketatsu, Ayana']
